org.divxdede.commons

Class Files

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.divxdede.commons.Files

  • public class Files
extends Object
    Class tools providing methods handling files manipulations.
    Since:
    0.2.3
    Author:
    André Sébastien (divxdede)

    • Method Detail

      • getBasename

        public static String getBasename(File file)
        Return the basename of the specified file.

        The basename is the name of the file without it's extension.

        Parameters:
        file - Specified file to return it's basename
        Returns:
        basename of the specified file

      • getExtension

        public static String getExtension(File file)
        Return the extension of the specified file (in lowercase).
        Parameters:
        file - Specified file to return it's extension
        Returns:
        extension of the specified file. this result will never be null but may be "" if the file has not extension of if it's a directory.

      • getExtension

        public static String getExtension(URL url)
        Return the extension of the specified URL (in lowercase).
        Parameters:
        url - Specified url to return it's extension.
        Returns:
        extension of the specified url.

      • copy

        public static void copy(File from,
        File to)
                 throws IOException
        Copy a File to another one.
        Parameters:
        from - File source
        to - file destination
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs during the copy

      • copy

        public static void copy(URL from,
        File to)
                 throws IOException
        Copy the content of the specified URL into a File.
        Parameters:
        from - URL source
        to - file destination
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs during the copy

      • copy

        public static void copy(InputStream from,
        File to)
                 throws IOException
        Copy the content of the specified InputStream into a File.

        The InputStream will be closed at the end of the copy even if an IOException occurs.

        Parameters:
        from - InputStream source
        to - file destination
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs during the copy

      • createTempDir

        public static File createTempDir(String prefix)
                          throws IOException
        Creates an empty directory in the default temporary-file directory, using the given prefix to generate its name.

        Be careful, You have the responsability to delete the directory.

        Parameters:
        prefix - Prefix of the temporary directory
        Throws:
        IOException

      • deriveFile

        public static File deriveFile(File file,
              String extension)
        Return a File instance based from the specified File but with another extension.

        The new File preserve the directory and the basename of the original File but replace it's extension.

        Parameters:
        file - File to change it's extension.
        extension - Extension to use for the new File
        Returns:
        A new file based from the specified File but with a new extension.

      • readInputStreamToString

        public static String readInputStreamToString(InputStream is,
                             String charsetName)
                                      throws IOException
        Read an InputStream into a String using the specified Charset for character interpretation
        Throws:
        IOException
